docs.text: Usage  The examples below are based on the example images: gifmaker/tests/images/ . To look at all the features, run: gifmaker -h Standard usage  gifmaker -i 1.png 2.png 3.png 4.png 5.png -o myanim.gif Or, using Unix regex: gifmaker -i *.png Note All images should have the same size. Cropping  gifmaker -i *.png -c 10 100 40 100 -o anim-crop.gif Rescaling  For 2x downsampling: gifmaker -i *.png -r 0.5 -o anim-ds.gif You can combine processes. Example: cropping and 2x upsampling (in the same order): gifmaker -i *.png -c 50 100 50 100 -r 2 -o anim-ds.gif
